title: Is Tesla pursuing sodium ion battery technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: Most likely not, if Tesla were looking into any battery tech utilizing sodium it would likely be a Solid State battery. Tesla already has Li-ion battery that is > 2x the best energy density found in Sodium-ion batteries. And they’re on a path to double that energy density, which there’s no indication that Sodium-ion battery tech has had any major breakthroughs to even get to current Li-ion battery energy densities.
